lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The first banks to issue the variable money market CDs were Sanwa Bank Ltd, Sumitomo Trust and Banking Co Ltd, Dai-Ichi Kangyo Bank Ltd, Fuji Bank Ltd and Sumitomo Bank Ltd, each with tranches of 100 mln dlrs, Shearson detailed.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Balaban noted that several fiduciary investors and money market funds which had never previously purchased Japanese bank paper submitted bids during yesterday's sale.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In yesterday's series, the issuing banks' coupon rates were set at the commercial bank composite rate plus a spread which is expected to equal an all-in-cost of LIBOR minus 10 basis points, Shearson said.
